short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically searches for better prices for flights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopping for flights can be confusing - it's hard to know whether you are getting the best price for your flight without spending hours shopping different travel agents, airlines and price comparison sites. 
Squirrel can help. When you are shopping on popular travel sites for a flight, Squirrel will search for a better prices and will let you know if it finds a cheaper price. You may even find a price that isn't available anywhere else!

Beta 0.4.2 will search for a better price when shopping on the following sites (AUD only):
https://www.google.com/travel/flights/
https://www.webjet.com.au/
https://www.virginaustralia.com/au/
https://www.qantas.com/
+ many more coming soon

How to use?
1. Go to one of the supported sites mentioned above.
2. Search for the flights you want to take.
3. Select the flight times and options that suit you.
4. Proceed to the checkout to confirm the exact flight you are looking for.
5. Once on the checkout page, Squirrel will automatically search our network for better prices while you shop. If a better price is found we will notify you.

 Squirrel will notify you when you could be saving on your next trip!
